department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Exterior masonry coating repair of the House of la Petite-Ferme in Cap-Tourmente, located in St-Joachim, Quebec, Canada
description: The Government of Canada is issuing a REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for the Exterior masonry coating repair of the House of la Petite-Ferme in Cap-Tourmente, located in St-Joachim, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in the bid solicitation and in the plans and specifications.
duration_in_months: Illustrated as follows: Expectation as of August 1st to finish the deliverables within a time frame of two months. In other words, this should be fully done by October 31st of the same year. Expected end date for this contract is October 31st.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement for Exterior Masonry Coating Repair

## Tender Notice Information

### Tender Reference Number

*   EE520-240296

### Tender Title 

*   English: Exterior masonry coating repair, House of la Petite-Ferme
*   French: Réparation du revêtement extérieur de maçonnerie, Maison de la Petite-Ferme

### Amendment Number and Date

*   Amendment Number: 2
*   Amendment Date: 2023-07-12T14:30:28:000000

### Publication and Closing Dates

*   Publication Date: 2023-06-22T14:30:28:000000
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-20T14:00:00

### Expected Contract Dates

*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-08-01
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2023-10-31

### Tender Status

*   Tender Status: Expired (Closed for Bidding)

### Procurement Details

*   Procurement Category: CNST (Construction)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Contracting and End User Entities

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   End User Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contact Information

*   Name: Pierre-Luc Dube (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: [pierre-luc.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:pierre-luc.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Tender Description

PWGSC issued this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Exterior masonry coating repair of the House of la Petite-Ferme in Cap-Tourmente, St-Joachim, Quebec, Canada, as outlined in the bid solicitation and plans and specifications. 

**Access the Tender Notice**

You can access the detailed Tender Notice through the following link:
